title: (x) Please can anyone ID this font? / bold sans - Foundry Monoline Extrabold {Rainer}
content:
Hello everyone!  
Sorry the type is not straight but it was taken from a 4x4 rear wheel cover  
Any help finding this font really appreciated  
Steve
author: auto-steve

comments.content: The closets font to it is Heldustry

Thanks for the close font. It seems a difficult one to identify. I've also tried wtfont and identifont but no luck.  
cheers!
Looks like [Foundry Monoline Extrabold](http://web.archive.org/web/20111214115551/http:/www.foundrytypes.co.uk/). Pity they don’t have a better preview on the page to be sure about it …

Yes it must be Foundry Monolite Extrabold. The comma is a perfect match as well.  
Hope the set is not too expensive!  
Thanks to all,  
Steve
